title.narrative: Rural Development: Rural Socio-economic Opportunities Programme (POSER)

description.narrative: In the context of the overall poverty reduction goal, POSER development objective is to increase rural populations' income through the promotion of inclusive and sustainable economic opportunities. Women and youth will be the programme's main targets. It will focus on: (i) supporting income-generating micro-projects (in line with the trend observed during the last phase of the PLPR); (ii) ensuring that agriculture-focused economic activities implemented by the beneficiaries contribute to food security; (iii) ensuring that the revenues collected from these economic activities contribute to improving the beneficiaries livelihood (with respect to their diet and their access to basic goods and services). POSER will achieve such objective by further strengthening the management skills of the local institutions supported by the PLPR: the ACDs and CRPs. Their anchoring in rural areas has made them key stakeholders capable of sustainably contribute to the economic opportunities promoted by POSER.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Rural Socio-economic Opportunities Programme (POSER)

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
